array.string: Military Police of the State of Rio de Janeiro (PMERJ):190
Military Fire Brigade of the State of Rio de Janeiro (CBMERJ) : 193
DEAT(Special Police Unit for Tourism Support): 2332-2924
Use sunscreen when exposed to the sun.
Use light clothing suitable for tropical countries.
Use Repellent to previne Aedes Aegypti tramnsmitting Zica,Dengue and Chikungunya.
Always wash your hands to previne: Flu H1N1 and Zica.
Ask for help by calling 190, which is the emergency for the Military Police of Rio de Janeiro.
Do not react, do not make sudden movements, keep calm.
Always look for the support of public safety officers who will be strategically positioned to best serve you.
Security officers and the police should aways be your reference.
Foreign tourists can go to the nearest police station, but for a greater convinience, go to the Special Police Unit for Tourism Support (DEAT)- Tel.:2332-2924
Civil, the military police and also the municipal Guard have specialized services for tourist.
Diplomatic missions can also be a good option for you to learn the best pratices and measures to be taken in case of incidents, simply contact: www.itamaraty.gov.br/temas/embaixadas-e-consulados
